name: Let's Fly High
description:
How far can you fly?

Time to fly to the top of the leaderboard! Race against millions of players, fly to the furthest and outrun your opponents!
Upgrade your wings, stamina and income to get better. Unlock new wings, characters and even more!

Simple gameplay with efficient and easy to learn controls.

Have you ever dreamed flying with wings attached to your back? It's high time to try it!
